This blog was created for the final project of EDLD 653 Functional Programming at University of Oregon by Shijing Zhou, Vinita Vader, and Raleigh Goodwin.\
\
The materials used in this blog are all publicly available on the internet; our data, the [Generic Conspiracist Beliefs Scale Responses](https://www.kaggle.com/lucasgreenwell/generic-conspiracist-beliefs-scale-responses), was posted to [kaggle](kaggle.com) by Lucas Greenwell.
